questions.text: How important is music to you?
How much do you listen to music?

options.text: Very little or not at all

questions.text: Have you played an instrument, and if so, for how long?

options.text: I have not played an instrument

questions.text: Do you have a formal education in music?

options.text: No, I have not studied music
No, but I have taken music courses
Yes, I have a degree related to music
